page.title: 07Spaxton Village Hall.
page.content: The village hall was built in 1935 and the adjoining playing fields added in 1957. A court pavillion was built in1976. The hall is used 2 mornings a week by the Spaxton Playgroup. Daytime lettings also include the Toddlers Group,Art club and Auction sales. Most evenings the hall is used by the following clubs Badmington Young Farmers.Women,s Institute.FOLK Dance Club. 12 Disco,s are booked each year organised by local groups to raise fund money. 24 Bingo Sessions.20 Private Parties. 2 Flower Shows and Fetes and many Jumble Sales. The stage and dressing rooms are used by the revived Pantomime Society. There is a large car park.
